vsParam:

Wow. I'm cold! What's happening!?

Yeah... [px]!?

Hoho, are you surprised?

Yes! This is pretty charming food!
It has a magical sweet flavor and is perfect to eat on a hot day...!

The "Fruit Sorbet"!
Come on. Have a taste.

Wow... Ah...! This is so good. Cool and sweet...!
I've never tried anything like this before...!

Hehe. That's right!
Besides this, there are many more delicious things on land.

And...
There's also a lot of beautiful scenery and treasures.

Hehe. It's alright, Mr. Rod.
You don't have to say it... I can feel how you care about me.

Thanks, everyone. And... Sorry.
I've been too depressed lately.

Thanks to you guys, I got to see Mr. Rod again,
and taste such a delicious thing...

Thanks to you guys, I can experience various sorts
of things from now on. I'm a lucky person.

Therefore... My depression is gone! I'm back to the innocent
and beautiful young Amaryllis!

Ha ha. You said it yourself~!
So interesting!

Yeah! This is the truth!
... So, guys! Let's sing!

Let's sing until our mouths get parched and
tongues scorched. Otherwise, I will not forgive you!

Ha ha. I'd love to!
I have a very strong throat!

I'll do my best! Please enjoy my beautiful voice

we can't go there now.

Although I'm alone again...
That gift, I'll go with that gift.
